troubleshooting.title: Rectangular Selection Feature Does Not Work On Windows

condition.title: Problem
condition.p: When trying to use the Rectangular Selection feature on Windows using both the keyboard and mouse, releasing the Alt key shifts the focus to the main menu instead of entering the edit mode.

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: This seems to be an issue caused by something that was changed in Java 8u172.

steps-informal.p: A workaround is to use Shift or Ctrl along with Alt and release them simultaneously.
